DOC.brief_summary: The purpose clinical study characterize efficacy safety Percutaneous Osseointegrated Prosthesis ( POP ) device provide satisfactory platform direct skeletal attachment prosthetic limb , include subdermal seal , thus allow proper biobarrier around implant .
DOC.brief_title: Early Feasibility Study Percutaneous Osseointegrated Prosthesis ( POP )
DOC.criteria: US Military veteran transfemoral amputation result dysvascular disease Has use use `` socket suspension technology '' prosthesis Use nonpropulsive , passive microprocessorregulated device Agrees participate high level physical activity study Subject meet anatomical eligibility criterion investigational device Currently active military duty More 1 limb amputate Has insulin dependent adult onset diabetes Recent tobacco use
